tools.maths.normalise_signal¶

tools.maths.normalise_signal(data: Union[numpy.ndarray, pandas.core.frame.DataFrame]) → Union[numpy.ndarray, pandas.core.frame.DataFrame]¶

Returns a normalised signal, such that the maximum value in the signal is 1, or the minimum is -1

Parameters

data (np.ndarray) – Signal to be normalised

Returns

normalised_data – Normalised signal

Return type

np.ndarray or pd.DataFrame
